def_en: If you embrace someone, you put your arms around them and hold them tightly, usually in order to show your love or affection for them. You can also say that two people embrace .

def_cn: 欣然接受，支持（变革、政治体制、观点等）
def_en: If you embrace a change, political system, or idea, you accept it and start supporting it or believing in it.
If something embraces a group of people, things, or ideas, it includes them in a larger group or category.
